price: Isaaniif fakkeenya godhi warra gandaa kan yeroo ergamtoonni isheetti dhuftee.
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
